snippet.title: Twinkle Star Knights - Release Gameplay - PC Version - Mobile/PC - F2P - JP
snippet.description:
DMM just released another gacha for mobile and PC in Japan. It's quite simple turn-based anime style, full 2D game but the combat is very flashy. Maybe a good option as secondary AFK game. There is an adult version too as usual :P

Game website: https://twinklestarknights.jp/
Adult version: https://x.twinklestarknights.jp/

Android: https://apkcombo.com/dmm-games/com.dmm.app.store/
To play on Android you need to install the DMM Store and look for the game: ティンクルスターナイツ

PC Version (DMM Player): https://player.games.dmm.com/

300 free gems minigame: https://twinklestarknights-minigame.jp/

#ティンクルスターナイツ #TwinkleStarKnights #DMMGames

Video recorded & edited by rendermax.
https://www.youtube.com/rendermax
https://www.twitch.tv/rendermax
https://twitter.com/rendermaxblog
https://rendermax.tumblr.com/
https://ko-fi.com/rendermax

Feel free to join my Discord server: https://discord.gg/uaY4SZ3

Want more? Vote, Comment, Subscribe and Share! Thx :D
